{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CNet |model=CQR-980 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/12/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=E-TOP |manuf_model=BR080n |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U6A-BR080N |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C;RTL8196C, A5P02A2, GA23 TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25Q16BVSIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE;RTL8188RE, A4L38S1 GA20; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=portable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CQR-980_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^CQR-980_[a-f0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:08:A1 |oui_eth=00:08:A1 }} ''Wireless-N Pico Broadband Router''
[http://www.cnet.com.tw/zip/CQR-980/CQR-980(A)_User%20Manual_Ver1.1_20100729.pdf Manual] There is no FCC ID printed on the label. The FCC ID of the parent model has been assigned to this device. When set to function in AP mode, the device assumes the IP of 192.168.1.254. "EPMBBR080NXXX2XX" is silkscreened on the board. The default SSID follows the format of '''CQR-980_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the WAN interface MAC with lower case letters. The power adapter included with the device is a '''Keen Ocean Industrial''' S04-003-0050-00600 (5V, 0.5A). ==Images== File:CNet CQR-980 angled.jpg|angled File:CNet CQR-980 front.jpg|front File:CNet CQR-980 bottom.jpg|bottom File:CNet CQR-980 back.jpg|back File:CNet CQR-980 power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:CNet CQR-980 board top.jpg|board top File:CNet CQR-980 RTL8196C.jpg|RTL8196C File:CNet CQR-980 RTL8188RE side.jpg|RTL8188RE side File:CNet CQR-980 RAM.jpg|RAM File:CNet CQR-980 board ID.jpg|board ID File:CNet CQR-980 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:CNet CQR-980 Flash.jpg|Flash [[Has images::internal| ]]
